'''''Vinyar Tengwar 33''''' is the thirty-third issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal dedicated to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
{{VTnav|32|34}}

==Contents==
* Cover: "Pippin and the Palantir" — Patrick H. Wynne
* E.L.F. News

* "''Haranya Lar''" — Christopher Gilson
* "Elvish and Mannish" — Christopher Gilson
